code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Todo=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{var arr=[];for(var i=0;i<4;i++){var element={id:i,name:`Hello${i}`,isComplete:false};arr.push(element);}setTasks(arr);},[]);const Complete=id=>{console.log(tasks[id]);var arr=tasks;arr[id].isComplete=true;setTasks(arr);};const Delete=id=>{console.log(tasks[id]);var arr=tasks;arr.splice(id,1);setTasks(arr);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:tasks===null||tasks===void 0?void 0:tasks.map(t=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t.isComplete?t.name.strike():t.name}),!t.isComplete?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"complete-btn",onClick:()=>Complete(t.id),children:"complete"}):'',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:()=>Delete(t.id),children:"delete"})]});})});};export default Todo;
